article_title: Vacation's over ... What do you do with all those souvenirs?
article_text: Mary Beth Schweigert writes for the Lifestyle section of Lancaster Newspapers. She can be reached at mschweigert@lnpnews.com or (717) 291-8757. You can also follow@mbschweigert on Twitter.

article_metadata.author: MARY BETH SCHWEIGERT | Lifestyle Staff

og.description: Easy ideas to turn your travel treasures into keepsakes that help vacation memories stay fresh long after summer fades.
